text:
Michael B Jordan is currently lacking a romantic partner. Jordan said to the Wall Street Journal recently that he was “dating,” but it’s challenging to find someone in the city in which he lives.

The star of Black Panthers blamed his lack of a love life on the city, Los Angeles, the city of Angels. Michael said LA isn’t exactly conducive to a romantic relationship.

However, with that said, even if he wanted to have a girlfriend he would probably have to get the approval of his roommates. Ironically, the movie star lives with his mom and dad.

That’s right, Michael’s roommates are his mom and dad. They moved out to Los Angeles to be with him after his career took off.

And while some might be disappointed Michael hasn’t found luck, it’s not likely he would be able to make it work anyway; he’s always busy preparing for roles.

To get ready for his character as Erik Killmonger, he studied other actors’ performances such as Heath Ledger and Michael Fassbender. Jordan said he intends to create “a performance that people will remember,” something which is different.

He even put on twenty pounds of muscle for the movie. He gained it everywhere, in the chest, on his back, his legs, his quads; according to the star, he was massive.

Additionally, Michael intends to make an appearance in HBO’s adaption of Fahrenheit 451, the series which is based on the classic dystopian novel.

Advertisement

And surprisingly – even though he’s super famous as an actor – people still ask him if he’s related to Michael Jordan, the legendary basketball player. He said people say to him, “is he your dad?” The only response he can muster is merely to shake his head.
title: Michael B Jordan Says “LA Isn’t The Best Place To Date” And He’s “Technically” Single
